title: A 2D/3D nanoplatform for electrochemical diagnosis of miRNA-122 in breast cancer cell lines.
abstract: A novel, label-free electrochemical biosensor was precise engineered for the ultrasensitive and selective detection of miRNA-122, a pivotal biomarker in breast cancer diagnostics. This innovative sensing platform harnesses the exceptional conductivity of Ti
